name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix bug when adding card in Coto Digital

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to fix bug when adding new card in Coto Digital

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This package is a temporary fix to the bug found in Coto Digital when attempting to upload a new credit card in checkout. Until Coto fixes the bug this extension will help you to enable the broken button you need to upload your card.
